DefaultView.Heading.title: Own the passion
DefaultView.Heading.description: Don’t miss out on the opportunity to own the most epic, talked-about soccer moments in the history of laLiga.
DefaultView.Hero.description: LaLiga Golazos is a whole new way to connect with your favorite team and players by collecting next-level digital video NFTs of epic highlights from the biggest games.
AuthenticatedView.Heading.title: Congrats, you’re on the waitlist
AuthenticatedView.Heading.description: Top X% will receive access to closed beta Top Y % of the X will also receive an airdrop moment/some other incentive
